---
title: "App Features"
---

NHSquicker provides a range of features designed to help users find the most appropriate urgent-care service.

### Feature Overview

- **View live wait times**
- **Find alternative services**, such as GPs and pharmacies
- **Access information** on health conditions and treatments
- Option to **call NHS 111** (for advice) **or 999** (emergencies only)

---

## View live wait times

This is the primary function of NHSquicker, enabling users to compare real-time waiting times and choose the most appropriate service for their needs.

NHSquicker provides a range of features designed to help users find the most appropriate urgent-care service.



### Alternative Services:

The app also provides information for alternative services such as GP and pharmacies:

![](images/Screenshot%20(23).png){fig-align="center" width="197"}

### Health Conditions and Treatments:

The app provides access to trusted information on health conditions and treatments, linking directly to content from the NHS website.

<https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/>.

### Call 111 or 999

NHSquicker allows users to quickly access urgent advice or emergency services when needed.

- **NHS 111** for urgent medical advice  
- **999** for emergencies only  

![](images/Screenshot%20(18).png){fig-align="center" width="188"}
